text: F47 may refer to: * HMS Danae (F47), a Leander-class frigate of the Royal Navy * INS Shivalik (F47), the lead ship of her class of multi-role frigates of the Indian Navy * Brazilian frigate Dodsworth (F47) * The Republic P-47 Thunderbolt was redesignated the F-47 when retired from the US Air Force and transferred to the Air National Guard from 1948-1953.
title: F47
